DOC.brief_summary: This Phase III , randomize , multicenter , two-arm , open-label study design evaluate safety efficacy trastuzumab emtansine compare lapatinib + capecitabine Chinese participant HER2-positive , unresectable locally advanced breast cancer ( LABC ) metastatic breast cancer ( MBC ) receive prior trastuzumab-based therapy . A total approximately 400 participant enrolled China . Eligible participant randomize 3:1 ratio receive either trastuzumab emtansine control ( lapatinib + capecitabine ) .
